arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – The superb initiative from the Parisian side
arts.sum: This Wednesday, Paris Saint-Germain will face FC Barcelona at the Montjuïc Stadium (kick-off at 9 PM, CET) in the second matchday of the 2025-2026 UEFA Champions League. For this match, the Parisian club has launched a great initiative: auctioning off the match-worn jerseys, with all proceeds going to the Xana Foundation, founded by coach Luis […]

arts.ttl: Barcelona-PSG rematch will thrill the world, but take a heavy toll on Luis Enrique
arts.sum: Seventeen months ago, Luis Enrique showed the world what his PSG were capable of by beating Barcelona, but it was a victory that came at a price.

arts.ttl: Official: PSG confirm key forward will miss Barcelona tie along with three more absentees
arts.sum: Barcelona’s clash against PSG in the UEFA Champions League is expected to be the single-most hypes game of the season, especially given the form of both sides over the past year. Developments over the past few weeks, however, have significantly dampened the excitement as both sides have seen key players injured and thus ruled out […] The post Official: PSG confirm key forward will miss Barcelona tie along with three more absentees appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona boss Hansi Flick expected to reshuffle defense vs PSG – Report
arts.sum: FC Barcelona are gearing up for a blockbuster UEFA Champions League showdown against defending champions Paris Saint-Germain on Wednesday night. Both sides come into the clash as two of the most in-form teams in Europe, and victory would send a strong statement of intent about their UCL credentials. According to Mundo Deportivo, Hansi Flick is […] The post Barcelona boss Hansi Flick expected to reshuffle defense vs PSG – Report appeared first on Sempre Barca.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Paris squad: 2 pieces of excellent news, but a new injury!
arts.sum: This Wednesday (kick-off at 9 pm, CET), Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face FC Barcelona (12th) at the Montjuïc Stadium for the second matchday of the 2025-2026 UEFA Champions League. Here is the squad selected by Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hakimi, Hernandez, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi. Midfielders – […]

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG Prediction: Lamine Yamal to Make Statement After Ballon d’Or Snub?
arts.sum: Will Lamine Yamal respond to his Ballon d'Or snub against the UEFA Champions League holders? We look ahead to Wednesday's clash with our Barcelona vs PSG prediction and preview.
